title: Lament for the Living
description: What happens after the zombie apocalypse?Set three years after the Outbreak that destroyed their lives, 'Lament for the Living' follows the inhabitants of the Sanctuary as their safe and secluded existence is threatened by a group of nomadic survivors.When the Rangers of the Sanctuary head out to investigate a mysterious fire, they find the true nature of humanity and the societies that evolve after the zombie apocalypse.Ultimately everyone has to choose: Survivor, or Nomad?
author: David  Nicol
